name: assemble-cars-lambda
description: Assemble partial raw CAR files into complete CAR files

scripts.init: npm run build && DEBUG=assemble-cars:* node scripts/bin.js init
scripts.deploy-l: aws lambda update-function-code --cli-connect-timeout 15000 --region us-east-2 --function-name assemble-cars --zip-file fileb://dist/lambda.zip
scripts.invoke: aws lambda invoke --cli-binary-format raw-in-base64-out --region $AWS_REGION --function-name $LAMBDA --payload file://event.json --log-type Tail /dev/null | jq -r .LogResult | base64 -d

author: Vasco Santos <santos.vasco10@gmail.com>
